name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design Basics
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Airflow
lessons.description: Understanding the behavior of air over surfaces.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Study of airflow at speeds below the speed of sound.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Study of airflow at speeds greater than the speed of sound.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Effects in Flight
lessons.description: Understanding how high-speed air causes heating on surfaces.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Materials in Spacecraft Design
lessons.description: Choosing materials suitable for space environments.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler’s Laws
lessons.description: Introduction to the basic laws of orbital motion.

lessons.name: Orbit Transfers
lessons.description: How spacecraft move between orbits.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Subsystem Overview
lessons.description: Introduction to spacecraft power, communication, and control subsystems.

name: Atomic Structure and Bonding
description: Introduction to atomic theory and chemical bonding in organic molecules.

lessons.name: Atomic Orbitals
lessons.description: Understanding s, p, and hybrid orbitals in carbon compounds.

name: Functional Groups
description: Overview of organic functional groups and their reactivity.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons and Alcohols
lessons.description: Introduction to alkanes, alkenes, alkynes, and alcohols.

name: Reaction Mechanisms
description: Understanding common organic reaction types and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Study of SN1 and SN2 reaction mechanisms.

name: Atomic Theory in Inorganic Chemistry
description: Study of atoms, ions, and periodic properties.

lessons.name: Periodic Table Trends
lessons.description: Exploring trends such as electronegativity and ionization energy.

name: Coordination Compounds
description: Introduction to complex ions and coordination chemistry.

lessons.name: Ligands and Complex Ions
lessons.description: Understanding ligand types and bonding.

name: Crystal Field Theory
description: Exploring the electronic structure of metal complexes.

lessons.name: Splitting of d-Orbitals
lessons.description: Explanation of how ligand fields affect metal ion orbitals.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Introduction to the laws of thermodynamics and energy transfer.

lessons.name: First Law of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Understanding energy conservation in physical systems.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Study of reaction rates and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Rate Laws
lessons.description: Determining reaction order and rate constants.

name: Quantum Chemistry
description: Fundamentals of quantum theory as applied to chemical systems.

lessons.name: Wave-Particle Duality
lessons.description: Introduction to quantum principles in chemistry.

name: Elvish Writing Systems
description: Study of Tengwar and Cirth scripts.

lessons.name: Introduction to Tengwar
lessons.description: Learning the basic symbols and pronunciation of Tengwar.

name: Ancient Tongues of Middle-earth
description: Overview of Quenya, Sindarin, and other ancient languages.

lessons.name: Quenya Grammar Basics
lessons.description: Understanding noun cases and verb forms in Quenya.

name: Translation and Interpretation
description: Translating ancient scripts and understanding cultural context.

lessons.name: Reading Ancient Texts
lessons.description: Translating short texts from Elvish to Common Tongue.

name: History of Middle-earth Relations
description: Overview of diplomatic relations among the races of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Early Alliances
lessons.description: Exploring the first alliances between Elves and Men.

name: Elven and Human Politics
description: Study of political systems in Elven and Human societies.

lessons.name: Elven Councils and Human Kingships
lessons.description: Comparing the governing structures of Elves and Men.

name: The Role of Wizards
description: Examining the influence of wizards in diplomacy and conflict resolution.

lessons.name: Gandalf’s Mediation
lessons.description: A case study of Gandalf’s role in uniting races against Sauron.
